flawed_nl_solution:
The canvases cost $40 and she spent half that amount on paint so she spent 40/2 = $<<40/2=20>>20 on paint
She spent $40 on canvases, $20 on paint and $15 on an easel so she spent 40+20+15 = $<<40+20+15=57>>57
She spent $90 total and her other purchases totaled $57 so she spent 90-57 = $<<90-57=33>>33 on paint brushes
#### 33

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 57. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
